forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Rain And Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely between 2am and 5am, then rain and snow. Mostly cloudy. Low around 32, with temperatures rising to around 36 overnight. North wind 1 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.shortForecast: Rain And Snow then Chance Rain And Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow before 8am, then rain and snow between 8am and 10am, then rain and snow likely between 10am and 11am, then a chance of rain and snow between 11am and 5pm, then a chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 39. East northeast wind 2 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.
